title: Jot Down Values For Later
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . also use GitHub Actions re-render README.Rmd every time push. example workflow can found : https://github.com/r-lib/actions/tree/v1/examples. can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(jot) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

title: Get Current User — get_jot_user
text: user user override get . Default '', checks options, system info.

what: Get System Time as Integer — get_sys_time
title: Get System Time as Integer — get_sys_time
Get System Time as Integer — get_sys_time
Get System Time as Integer — get_sys_time
Get System Time as Integer — get_sys_time
Title — jot
code: jot(   note,   name,   user = get_jot_user(),   time = get_sys_time(),   pad = jot_active() )  write_jot(   note,   name,   user = get_jot_user(),   time = get_sys_time(),   pad = jot_active() )

title: Title — jot
text: note data save. required. name character, name data. required. user name user. default get_jot_user(). time system time. default get_sys_time(). pad path file pad write . default jot_active().

Lock or Unlock a jot Notepad — jot_lock
code: tf <- tempfile() new_pad(tf) jot_activate(tf) jot_lock() jot_unlock()

title: Open and Close jot Notepads — jot_open
Open and Close jot Notepads — jot_open
code: jot_open(pad)  jot_activate(pad)  jot_active()  jot_current()  jot_close()  jot_deactivate()

title: Open and Close jot Notepads — jot_open
Open and Close jot Notepads — jot_open
Open and Close jot Notepads — jot_open
code: tf <- tempfile() new_pad(tf) jot_open(tf) jot_active() jot_current() jot_close() jot_active()

title: Read a jot Notepad — jot_read
code: jot_read(field, pad = jot_active())  read_jot(field, pad = jot_active())

title: Read a jot Notepad — jot_read
text: field field read pad path file open

title: Read a jot Notepad — jot_read
code: tf <- tempfile() new_pad(tf) jot_activate(tf) jot(note = 'ex_note', name = 'ex_name') jot_read() #> $ex_name #> [1] "ex_note" #>  jot_read('ex_name') #> [1] "ex_note"

what: Read in all values from a jot Notepad — jot_skim
title: Read in all values from a jot Notepad — jot_skim
Read in all values from a jot Notepad — jot_skim
Read in all values from a jot Notepad — jot_skim
Read in all values from a jot Notepad — jot_skim
Read in all values from a jot Notepad — jot_skim
code: tf <- tempfile() new_pad(tf) jot_activate(tf) jot('ex_val', 'ex') jot_skim() #> $ex #> [1] "ex_val" #>

title: Create new jot Notepad — new_pad
text: file path file title call notepad. supplied, uses name file.
